complaint.description: I am a 20 year customer who never missed a payment and for about the last 5 years Vodacom is getting worse every year. I am trying to terminate a contract for more than a week now. The contract's 24 months was out in Feb 21 so the special is not valid. The persons that call you to upgrade can't end your contract and they talk all over you. Vodacom has no email for complaints and the phone number to end the contract cuts off in half a second. The other option is to use TOBI, a robot, but it doesn't work either.
complaint.suggestion: Improve customer service by providing a reliable phone number for contract termination and ensuring that the TOBI chatbot is functional.
